name: Vickie Baker
text: Pizza Hut in LaVale is very family oriented. The waitress was very friendly and checked on us often. We didn't have to wait long for our food

name: K
text:
Service was great. The pizza was not the greatest. The cheese wasnâ€™t even melted on the pizza.
And the bathrooms are absolutely disgusting!!

name: Sidney Evans
text: Sunday lunch rush. This place was packed. They only had one server.  Pizza Hut has got to make a major redesign or else they will fall by the wayside. It's not just this hut. It's an allover issue with many huts. They can no longer compete â€¦More

name: Aundrea White
text: Always love my pizza. We love this location because the pay attention and make your dinner the way you ordered.

name: Xz Nytro
text: Very fast service. Very kind staff. Wheel chair accessible. Great pizza

name: Eric Ringler
text: Dirty tables as soon as I walked in, pasta was overcooked, burned,  or both. Meaty marinara tasted cheap.

name: Frederick Ferrer
text: The guy working the front was one of the most polite, professional fast food workers Iâ€™ve met.  Quick, accommodating and attentive.  Wish all workers had his work ethic and attributes!

name: Tyler Worrell
text: This used to be one of my favorite places to eat but recently was very disappointing. The crust tasted like cardboard, and the pizza overall had a bad aftertaste. The only thing that was good was the wings. Their wings are pretty good. But if I'm going to pizza hut I kinda want good pizza too. So unfortunately I'm giving it 2 stars.

name: David Adams
text: Always good food always polite made how you want

name: Vincent Ciaramella
text: The service was excellent. The manager on duty was the epitome of professional. He took care of us like it was a 5 star restaurant.

name: Stephanie Baker
text: We went to this place January 5 and the server we had was a young lady she was very good she was very polite and filled our drinks even when we didnâ€™t ask which is one of the best waiters I have ever had. But there was some guys eating â€¦More

text: Oh my goodness, we came in for the new pizza that has the pizza pieces on the ends! I just love this Pizza hut. The service and food is always so good!!!

text: since when are you required to pay $1 extra per pizza for pan crust even when you get the so called special?? ridiculous.  it's because of the 20% more cheese that is required?? so... all these years you have been giving us that amount for free?? I think not.  money making scheme. that's all it is.
